Headline: Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Howard/Ridge
ShortDescription: Northbound 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Ashland, and Rogers due to street blockage near Howard/Ridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Howard, Ashland, and Rogers due to street blockage near Howard/Ridge.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechancial problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a mechancial problem on the train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
